_meta.source: Researched from Barbados Tourism, cruise port guides, and local sources

bbox_hint.note: Covers Bridgetown, west coast beaches, Harrison's Cave

transit_routes.name: Taxi to Carlisle Bay
transit_routes.note: Closest snorkeling. Sea turtles nearly guaranteed.

transit_routes.name: Taxi to Harrison's Cave
transit_routes.note: Central highlands. Cave tour takes ~1 hour. Book ahead.

transit_routes.name: Walk Historic Bridgetown
transit_routes.note: UNESCO site starts at port gate. Parliament, Nidhe Israel Synagogue.

featured_experiences.name: Turtle Swim at Carlisle Bay
featured_experiences.note: Boat trips from beach or swim out. Turtles frequent the wrecks.

featured_experiences.name: Harrison's Cave & Highlands
featured_experiences.note: Signature Cave tour $40 USD. Eco-Adventure tour more active.

featured_experiences.name: Rum Heritage Trail
featured_experiences.note: Mount Gay is oldest commercial rum. St. Nicholas Abbey most scenic.
